resources.string: The aim of the game is to collect words by visiting their location on the map, once you think enough words have been collected that you know the song, you can attempt to guess the name.
You have correctly guessed the name of the song
It seems you were not able to guess the song, have a star anyway
Words are classified as either boring , not boring , interesting or very- interesting , and all of the words are displayed.
Words are classified as either boring , not boring or interesting , and all of the words are displayed.
Words are classified as either boring, not boring or interesting, and only 75% of the words are displayed.
Words are classified as either boring or not boring, and only 50% of the words are displayed.
No additional information is given, words are unclassified, and only 25% of the words are displayed
Press and hold on a difficulty levels button for more information on what each level entails
